resources.string: Please make sure the box can work normally before adding：
① Plug in the power source, the music box indicator light is white
Please turn up the phone volume
Please turn up the volume of the phone \n and point the speaker of the phone at the device microphone
Please turn up the volume of your mobile phone and aim the speaker of your mobile phone at the device microphone\nmake sure you hear "cuckoo, cuckoo"
Please turn up the volume of your phone and aim the speaker of your phone at the device microphone\nmake sure you hear sound
Please install the battery on the accessory or connect the power adapter. If there is a plug, please unplug the plug.
Failure to set the time zone may cause abnormalities in services such as cloud storage
Bind device to account, please wait...
Le Box is not online, please check if it is online
Please select the gateway to be associated:
No equipment of this model, please confirm the model according to the prompts on the page
The device model is usually marked on the device label \n\n
LeChange equipment recommends enter the device model for network configuration；

The model of LeChange equipment is usually“TP、TF、TC、TD”beginning。
 for ：TP2、TP7、TF1T
Dahua equipment recommends choosing other models for network distribution；

The model of Dahua equipment is usually“IPC、DH”beginning。
 for：IPC-HFW1225M-1、DH-NVR1104HS
The label diagram is as follows：
Your device has been registered on the platform for more than 3 days, and the device and the client must be in the same LAN to bind. Please power off and restart the device
Sorry, you have tried 10 times, please try again after a 30-minute rest
I\'m very sorry, you have tried 20 times, take a break and try again tomorrow
Please connect your phone to WiFi
Confirmed to be connected to the same network
Please make sure that the phone is connected to the WiFi that the device is connected
It will automatically next step after connection
Connecting to the cloud platform, please wait...
The connection is abnormal, please exit and try again
Connected with device\'s hotspot, tap here to next step.
Connecting to the router, please wait...

Device password is Le Orange’s innovative security reinforcement strategy, designed to better protect your device Information security. Only by using the correct device password can the audio and video information of the device be obtained. \n When you connect the camera to NVR and other equipment, you need to manually enter the password. Please keep it safe: if you forget the password, you can restore the default configuration of the device and then add it to your account to set a new device password
Unable to detect network security configuration \n Please confirm that the phone and device are connected to the same network
Checking network security configuration, please wait...
Sorry, your device has been bound by %s
The device is already under your account
The input information is wrong, please check and re-enter
Please power off the device and reconnect the power and click "Restart"
Turn on the equipment\'s motion check, capture, and video functions
Click the deactivate button and find "Trial Package" in the upper right corner to experience it for free
Get free %1$s cloud storage%2$s monthly package
Get %1$s sky cloud storage permanent free tier
Please turn on the mobile phone "location service" to allow "Le Orange" to obtain the current WiFi information
Please enter the correct security verification code
Please enter the IMEI number of the device
Please enter the IMEI number on the label of the device body
Please enter the 8-digit device security code
Please enter the 6-digit security code of the device
Please enter the device serial number
*Music box and accessories do not support manual input of serial number to add
Please enter the serial number and security code on the device label
Place accessories as close as possible to the gateway device
Move the phone as close as possible to the device
The device prompts that the WIFI password is wrong？
Please give the device a name!
Please press the self-test/silence button of the device first
If you delete the device and add it again, you need to power off and reconnect
You have not completed the configuration, if you exit, you may restart the configuration process
Sorry, it is not currently supported to add devices of this model
Please follow the device indicator or voice prompts to select operation
Please follow the device indicator or voice prompt
The password is wrong, the device will be locked after 5 consecutive wrongs

1.If you have set a device password on the Le Orange client or other clients, and have forgotten the password, you can restore the default configuration of the device and add the device again to set a new device password. \n 2. If you have never set a device password, and your device label has the words "security code", please enter the 8-digit security code on the device label.
Please plug the device into the network cable
The QR code information is incomplete, please try to add the device manually
Keep the distance at 10-30cm and move slowly back and forth.\nAfter hearing the voice prompt of "QR code scan succeeded", click Next
Please face the QR code directly to the camera lens
Please connect your phone and device to the same network
Please scan the QR code on the device body
Please scan the QR code of Lechange device
To strengthen security protection, please set your device password
Your bell device is connecting to Wi-Fi. If the connection is successful, the cyan light of the device indicator will stop flashing, and the cyan light will be steady on
Tap here to check how to enable device\'s hotspot.
Failed to detect network security configuration
Please try again or choose another method to add the device
Use a thimble to press and hold the reset hole on the back of the device until the indicator on the front of the device goes out, then click "Restart"
The hotspot password of the device is the device security code, find the words "SC code" on the device label, and enter the 8-digit SC code on the device label。
If your automatic connection fails, please try to open the wifi list, without saving the password, try to re-enter the password
1.Your camera does not support 5G Hz band Wi-Fi temporarily. If you are using a dual-band router, please connect your phone and camera to 2.4G Hz band Wi-Fi signal。
2.If you are not sure of the Wi-Fi frequency band currently connected to your mobile phone and camera, you can check the router related manual and enter the router settings page to confirm.

If there are special symbols such as emoticons in your wifi name, for example: \uD83C\uDF39❤\uD83D\uDE0A\uD83D\uDCA6，It may cause your device to fail to connect normally, it is recommended to delete the special symbols in the WiFi name。
Verification failed, please re-enter the device password
Please wait for the system to automatically connect
Please enter the WiFi settings of your phone, connect to the hotspot named "%s", and then return to this page
Please enter the WiFi settings of your phone, connect to the hotspot named "%s", and then return to this page
*If there is no security verification code on the label, no need to enter it
The setting has not been saved, whether to exit
The summer time setting must be greater than 1 hour
How to check the device type
To enable Geofencing, please go to Settings > Imou on your phone. Then change the location setting to "Always".
The network is not working well, please check the network！
Sorry, too many attempts have been made for the device password. Your device has been locked. Please power off and restart the device
8-32 combination of digits, letters, symbols (case sensitive)
How to change the device password。
The necessary permissions are missing, please open permissions
In order to protect the network security of your device, it is recommended to modify the default device password after adding。
Jump failed, please install Google App Market first
Please install Huawei App Market first.
Please enable location information permission to use geographic location-based services and WiFi connection functions normally。
Please enable camera access permission to take pictures, scan QR codes and other functions normally
Please enable storage permission to use the functions of capturing, recording, downloading, etc. normally
Please enable the contact access permission to use the function of adding contacts in the address book normally
Please enable phone access to call the customer service hotline
Please enable microphone access to use intercom, custom voice recording and other functions normally
Please enable the contact write permission to save "LeChange Phone Alarm" as a contact
